title: bring back old client
body: the new one is laggy and looks jack

replies.body: It's not coming back, ever, it's gone, that's it, deal with the new client

Updating your drivers like your display adapter driver may fix the problem.
I had an issue yesterday that in the middle of a custom game there was a blue screen of death, and it was a bit laggy, then I searched it up and someone said that updating the display adapter driver may fix the problem. I updated my display adapter driver, and there was no longer any blue screen of death, and the game become less laggy.
You may want to defragment your hard drive as well, this may help the game to run smoothly.
At the end the old client will no longer be available anyway, so perform these fixes instead of going back to the old client.
On login, Click Region : NA and then it will come back to Login screen, Click Legacy Version and Click OCE it will pop up saying Get Alpha Client.. Just click play it should use Legacy.
